she has feelings for you!
is she crazy?

complications can arise,
things can go wrong...
and suddenly you're caught with your pants down.

needs to hear george's rendition of "sexy back" at 3:00 in the morning.

banged on the wall.

you did,right?

Yes.

you know,just totally impaired, like no-heavy-machinery drunk.

we don't get married.

before you moved in.We started making coffee at home.

Good morning.

or you could look like this.
or this.

um...how does this work exactly?

it's okay.I can take it.

it sounds a lot worse than it is.
Your face is extremely elastic,
and pulling it down allows me to repair the bone fractures
underneath without causing any scaring.

I'm that good.

The surgery won't affect my baby?
I'll be monitoring the baby throughout.
Okay?
Okay.

then I-I just have to pick one?
do I have to pick one now?

You didn't take too much time off after

congratulations,dr.Grey.
okay,let's go,people.

You don't--you don't want to talk to me,
you want to talk to us about a pat--about a patient.
That's what I just said.
Uh,this patient has a disease so rare that you'll probably never see it gain--F.O.P.

You become a human statue.
So just,uh,try to learn.

Okay.
If you people are interns, you need to stand back.
Nina,please don't be rude.
My mother still has movement in her face and hands.
I would like to keep it that way,so please be careful.
If you press too hard during an exam or bump into her accidentally,
it causes a bone to grow where a bone shouldn't grow.
So there can be no accidents.
Okay,remember that when you're dealing with her today.
It's just a stomach virus or a flu.
I'm sure it's nothing. Nina insisted that I come in.
She was vomiting blood
and going through her pain meds like they were candy.
And she has new growths on her back,
no doubt caused by some clumsy interns on her last hospital stay.

But what really concerns me is the vomiting.
So I'm gonna need a C.T., See what's going on.
did you build that?
My mom did.
No,nina did it.
I used to do it.I'm not able to.

and relaxed.

so we're light on surgeries.

using me.

cut off his foot to save his life.

you need to fix it.

short and long.

did you get my daughter pregnant?

somewhere you can raise a family.

you remembered.
